typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	max_col_name as string
}
source(output(
		{_id} as string,
		partyId as string,
		updateTime as timestamp,
		IPAddress as string,
		documentContext as string,
		document as string,
		submissionId as string,
		submissionVersion as string,
		policyId as string,
		referenceDocumenId as string,
		status as string,
		policyRole as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate({$max_col_name} = max(toDate($max_col_name))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink() ~> sink2
